name: 李教授的知识问答
description:
LEE's Q&A is a IQ test game. By answering questions, you can test your IQ , hope you perform well.



Games include

  • Primary IQ test
  • Ultimate IQ test
  • Advanced IQ test
  • IQ score and evaluation



Because of base edition, there are many places to improve, the full version of the game will be update only after the UI and the title library are perfect.

I hope you can support our games. Welcome to your opinions and suggestions
